subject: Get a new Toshiba Satellite(R) Laptop - *MID2070-58880442
body:
Dear Valued Subscriber,  

Today is your chance to get a new laptop computer! ConsumerDirectSavings 
has selected you to receive a laptop of your choice. (Participation required. 
See below for details.) 

** Confirm your e-mail address on our website and follow the 
instructions to get started. 
http://drive-thrusunshine.com/c/891409/opyt1zzy2:fzomttqsvXCKarprvrnt1YCKasrpqq2 


Sincerely, 
CDS Team 



*MID - Member ID

To unsubscribe from receiving future advertisements from ConsumerDirectSavings, 
go to:  http://drive-thrusunshine.com/n/?22628::169493

DirectToConsumerInteractive | 950 Walnut Bottom Road | Suite 15-212 | 
Carlisle, PA 17013

To receive the incentive gift you must: 1) register with valid information; 
2)complete the user survey; 3) complete at least 2 Silver, 2 Gold, 6 Platinum 
offers; and 4) refer 2 unique household(s) that also complete these requirements. 
Purchase may be required. Please read website Terms & Conditions for details. 
Upon completion of all requirements, we will ship the incentive gift to you 
with free shipping.

ConsumerDirectSavings is an independent rewards program for consumers and is 
not affiliated with, sponsored by or endorsed by any of the listed products 
or retailers. Trademarks, service marks, logos, and/or domain names (including, 
without limitation, the individual names of products and retailers) are the 
property of their respective owners. Copyright 2006 ConsumerDirectSavings. 
All rights reserved. 




No longer wish to be on this list, just send a reply email.
